cards.name: Agamotto
cards.ability: Game Start: Shuffle 4 Ancient Arcana into your deck.

cards.name: Bolts of Balthaak
cards.ability: Next turn, you get +4 Energy. (Banish this.)

cards.name: Captain Carter
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your other cards in the back row here gain this card's Power.

cards.name: Dum Dum Dugan
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your cards in the front row here have +1 Power.

cards.name: Eson
cards.ability: After each turn, put a card from your hand that didn't start in your deck here.

cards.name: Fan Fei
cards.ability: Activate: Move your other cards here away.

cards.name: Firehair
cards.ability: When one of your cards is destroyed, this uses that card’s On Reveal.

cards.name: Ghost, the First Rider
cards.ability: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-Power card for your hand. Remove that card's Power from this.

cards.name: Goliath
cards.ability: Ongoing: +1 Power for each other Ongoing you have in play.

cards.name: Hydra Stomper
cards.ability: Ongoing: +1 Power for each card you moved this game.

cards.name: Images of Ikonn
cards.ability: On Reveal: Transform your other cards here into copies of the highest-Power one. <i>(Banish this.)<i/>

cards.name: Infinity Ultron
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add 2 Ultron Infinity Stones to your hand.

cards.name: Kahhori
cards.ability: On Reveal: For each card in your hand, give a friendly card +1 Power.

cards.name: Khonshu
cards.ability: When discarded, returns in its next phase. On Reveal: Resurrect a card you discarded to another location with its Power set to 5.

cards.name: Khonshu Full
cards.ability: On Reveal: Resurrect a card you discarded to another location with its Power set to 12.

cards.name: Khonshu Waxing
cards.ability: When discarded, returns in its final phase. On Reveal: Resurrect a card you discarded to another location with its Power set to 7.

cards.name: Starbrand
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your opponent has +3 Power at each other location.

cards.name: Strange Supreme
cards.ability: Give this +2 Power whenever it merges. After each turn, merge one of your cards that didn't start in your deck into this.

cards.name: Temporal Manipulation
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give Agamotto +3 Power. Put him into your hand if he’s not in play. (Banish this.)

cards.name: Topaz
cards.ability: After you play a card here, move it to the middle location.

cards.name: Ultron Space Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Move the lowest-Power enemy card here to _ location.

cards.name: Ultron Reality Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a _ here. Set its Power to _.

cards.name: Ultron Time Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Put a card from your hand here.

cards.name: Ultron Mind Stone
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.

cards.name: Ultron Power Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Double Infinity Ultron’s Power.

cards.name: Ultron Soul Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: For each full location you have, give a friendly card there +2 Power.

locations.name: Celestial Burial Ground
locations.ability: Discard a card. Replace it with one that costs the same.

locations.name: Sakaar Grand Prix
locations.ability: After turn 4, the winner here gets +1 max Energy.

locations.name: Star Brand Crater
locations.ability: If you have 10 or more Power here, +1 Energy each turn.

items.title: Character Mastery
items: Get rewards for growing your unique collection and favorite characters!

items.title: Sanctum Showdown
items: Earn points each turn from the locations you’re winning, first player to reach 16 points wins!

items.name: Doom 2099
changes: 4/2 - After each turn, add a DoomBot 2099 to a random location if you played (exactly) 1 card.

items.name: DoomBot 2099
changes: 4/2 - Ongoing: Your other DoomBots and Doom have +1 Power.

items.name: Wiccan
changes: 4/7 - On Reveal: If you’ve spent all your Energy on previous turns, +2 Max Energy.

items.name: Surtur
changes: 3/4 - After you play a card with 10 or more Power, this gains +3 Power.
3/5 - After you play a card with 10 or more Power, this gains +3 Power. (twice per game)

items.name: Scorpion
changes: 2/2 - On Reveal: Afflict cards in your opponent’s hand with -1 Power.

items.name: Sunspot
changes: 1/0 - After each turn, gain +1 Power for each unspent Energy.

items.name: Sera
changes: 5/4 - Ongoing: Cards in your hand cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

items.name: Adam Warlock
changes: 5/5 - After each turn, draw a card if you're winning here.
2/0 - After each turn, draw a card if you're winning here. Otherwise, +1 Power.
